name: Jalapeño Popper Hot Dip
description: Let’s spice up your dip game. This hot n’ creamy mix is packed with all the jalapeño flavour you love without all the fuss of prepping an appy—just mix, heat, and serve, all in the same dish. Top it off with Better Than Bacon Topper for that extra “wow” factor. Scoop it up with crackers or veggie sticks and watch it disappear faster than you can say "game day!".
preparation: In Rectangular Steamer or baking dish, combine hot dip mix with cream cheese, sour cream, and cheddar cheese.
If desired, top with additional 1⁄4 cup cheddar cheese. Bake uncovered 10 min or until heated through. Serve with crackers, tortilla chips, toasted French bread slices, or sliced veggies.
tips: Make it in the microwave! In a 4-cup microwave-safe bowl, combine ingredients. Microwave uncovered on medium (50% power) for 2 min. Stir and top with 1⁄4 cup cheddar cheese, if desired. Microwave an additional 2 min on medium, or until cheese is starting to bubble.
